q: Sponsored Links`` There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do,'' he said. All sorts of nastiness. And it is not just politicians who are doing this to each other, and, frankly, politics has always been a contact sport in this country. but with all of the cable channels and talk radio and blogs, especially blogs, where people can be anonymous with their nastiness, I think has caused a level of coarseness in our society that we've all got to think about. Colin Powell said he thought Barack Obama was making an effort to reach across political divides to tone down the rhetoric and urged members of Congress to do the same. the deal that sent veteran forward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers.`` We're excited about( Keon Clark ),'' Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Baron Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job.
